    • Method Detail

      • getCurrentPage

        public static org.eclipse.swt.widgets.Composite getCurrentPage()
        Utility method to retrieve the current page.
        Returns:
        composite which was stored using the setCurrentPage method.
        See Also:
        setCurrentPage(Composite)

      • getKioskBody

        public static org.eclipse.swt.widgets.Composite getKioskBody()
        Gets the body composite when running using kiosk workbench advisor. You can use this to construct a composite as a child of the body and then call showKioskPage to show that page.

        NOTE: If the workbench is not initialized with YRCKioskWorkbenchAdvisor, then this method throws a runtime exception. It is suggested that you create an application class that extends YRCKioskApplication and override initKioskWindows for initialization.

        Sample code: 

             private void showMyPage() {
         MyPage page = new MyPage(YRCPlatformUI.getKioskBody(), SWT.NONE);
         YRCPlatformUI.showKioskPage(page);
     }

        Returns:
        Composite that is used for displaying screens. This composite uses stacklayout. You are not expected to do any direct changes to this composite.

        See Also:
        showKioskPage(Composite), YRCKioskApplication, YRCKioskWorkbenchAdvisor

      • showKioskPage

        public static void showKioskPage(org.eclipse.swt.widgets.Composite page)
        Utility to show a screen on when running using YRCKioskWorkbenchAdvisor. You must construct the page using the parent composite obtained using getKioskBody call.

        NOTE: If the workbench is not initialized with YRCKioskWorkbenchAdvisor, then this method throws a runtime exception. It is suggested that you create an application class that extends YRCKioskApplication and override initKioskWindows for initialization.

        Sample code: 

             private void showMyPage() {
         MyPage page = new MyPage(YRCPlatformUI.getKioskBody(), SWT.NONE);
         YRCPlatformUI.showKioskPage(page);
     }

        Parameters:
        page - Composite constructed using the parent obtained using getKioskBody.

        See Also:
        getKioskBody(), YRCKioskApplication, YRCKioskWorkbenchAdvisor

      • setKioskPageScope

        public static void setKioskPageScope(java.lang.String SCOPE_ID)
        Utility method to set the page scope. This method will enable the specified scope/context/key-bindings on the kiosk main page. NOTE: This method will only work if workbench has been initialized using the YRCKioskWorkBenchAdvisor.
        Parameters:
        SCOPE_ID - The scope/context which needs to be set.
        See Also:
        YRCKioskWorkbenchAdvisor, YRCKioskApplication

      • showHomePage

        public static void showHomePage()
        Utility method to get the current user home page.

      • setKioskPageScope

        public static final void setKioskPageScope(IYRCComposite parentForm)
        Utility method to set the page scope. This method will enable the specified scope/context/key-bindings on the current page which is active.

        The scope id's to enable are derived from the parentForm passed as input.

        Typically this method makes use of the form id of the parentForm and the form id's of its children if it contains any.
        Parameters:
        parentForm - The parent screen based on which the scope needs to be set.
